metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10871 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: 389-ds-base before versions 1.3.8.5, 1.4.0.12 is vulnerable to a CleartextStorage of Sensitive Information. By default, when the Replica and/orretroChangeLog plugins are enabled, 389-ds-base stores passwords inplaintext format in their respective changelog files. An attacker withsufficiently high privileges, such as root or Directory Manager, can querythese files in order to retrieve plaintext passwords.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
